herbs.name: Ajwain + kala namak
herbs.how_to_use: ½ tsp ajwain + pinch kala namak garam paani ke sath khaye. Mostly meals ke baad.

herbs.name: Jeera water
herbs.how_to_use: 1 tsp jeera ko 5 min boil kare. Thoda thanda karke subah khaali pet piye.

herbs.name: Saunf tea
herbs.how_to_use: 1 tsp saunf ko pani me ubale, chaan ke lunch/dinner ke baad halka garm piye.

herbs.name: Cold milk
herbs.how_to_use: ½–1 glass thanda doodh bina sugar ke dhire dhire piye jab burning feel ho.

herbs.name: Jeera + saunf water
herbs.how_to_use: ½ tsp jeera + ½ tsp saunf ko ubal kar thanda karke food ke baad piye.

herbs.name: Banana
herbs.how_to_use: 1 pakka banana heavy spicy food ke 1–2 ghante baad le sakte hain (agar suit kare to).

herbs.name: Isabgol
herbs.how_to_use: 1–2 tsp isabgol ko halka garm doodh ya pani ke sath raat ko sone se pehle le.

herbs.name: Ghee in warm milk
herbs.how_to_use: ½–1 tsp ghee ko garm doodh me milakar raat ko le sakte hain (agar dairy suit kare).

herbs.name: Papaya
herbs.how_to_use: Subah ya shaam 1 chhota bowl pakka papaya khaye, roz kuch din tak.

herbs.name: Warm milk + kesar
herbs.how_to_use: Raat ko sone se 30 min pehle 1 cup garm doodh me 1–2 kesar dhaage daal kar piye.

herbs.name: Chamomile tea
herbs.how_to_use: Sone se 20–30 min pehle 1 cup chamomile herbal chai le, bina strong chai/coffee.

herbs.name: Foot oil massage
herbs.how_to_use: Raat ko paero ko halka tel se 5–10 min massage karke dhule aur so jaye.

herbs.name: Onion juice
herbs.how_to_use: Pyaaz ka juice scalp par cotton se lagaye, 20–30 min baad mild shampoo se dhole. Week me 1–2 baar.

herbs.name: Methi dana paste
herbs.how_to_use: Rat bhar bhigi methi ko paste bana kar scalp par 20 min lagaye, phir dhole. Week me 1 baar.

herbs.name: Amla juice
herbs.how_to_use: Subah khaali pet 20–30 ml amla juice pani me milakar le (agar suit kare, doctor se pooch kar).

herbs.name: Neem water rinse
herbs.how_to_use: Neem patte pani me ubal kar thanda kare, isse hafte me 1–2 baar last hair rinse kare.

herbs.name: Curd + lemon mask
herbs.how_to_use: Dahi me thoda nimbu ras milakar scalp par 20 min lagaye, phir normal shampoo se dhole.

herbs.name: Tea tree oil
herbs.how_to_use: 2–3 boond tea tree oil ko carrier oil (coconut) me milakar scalp par halka massage kare.

herbs.name: Haldi + milk pack
herbs.how_to_use: 1 pinch haldi + 1 tsp milk/malai mix kare, face par patla layer 8–10 min lagaye, fir dhole.

herbs.name: Aloe vera gel
herbs.how_to_use: Fresh aloe gel raat ko clean face par patla layer me lagaye, morning normal pani se dhole.

herbs.name: Orange peel powder
herbs.how_to_use: Orange peel powder + dahi se paste banaye, week me 1 baar soft scrub jaisa use kare.

herbs.name: Neem paste
herbs.how_to_use: Neem patto ka paste sirf pimple area par 10–15 min lagaye, phir dhole. Week me 2–3 baar.

herbs.name: Multani mitti pack
herbs.how_to_use: Multani mitti + rose water se paste bana kar T-zone par 10 min lagaye, fully dry hone se pehle dhole.

herbs.name: Tea tree spot
herbs.how_to_use: 1 boond tea tree oil ko carrier oil me dilute karke sirf pimple par hi raat ko lagaye.

herbs.name: Garlic empty stomach
herbs.how_to_use: Subah khaali pet 1–2 kachcha lahsun kali paani ke sath nigalna (doctor se pooch kar).

herbs.name: Lemon water
herbs.how_to_use: Din me 1–2 baar nimbu pani bina extra namak/sugar ke le, hydration ke liye.

herbs.name: Beetroot
herbs.how_to_use: Roz diet me ½–1 chhota beetroot salad/juice ke form me add kare (agar doctor allow kare).

herbs.name: Salt water
herbs.how_to_use: Zyada weakness lage to 1 glass pani me thoda namak + sugar mila kar ORS jaisa peeye (doctor ke guidance se).

herbs.name: Raisins (kishmish)
herbs.how_to_use: 8–10 kishmish raat bhar bhigo kar subah khaali pet kha sakte hain.

herbs.name: Lemon honey water
herbs.how_to_use: 1 glass pani me nimbu + thoda shahad, slow sips me piye.

herbs.name: Karela juice
herbs.how_to_use: Subah khaali pet thoda karela juice pani me dilute karke, doctor ki advice se hi le.

herbs.name: Methi water
herbs.how_to_use: Raat bhar 1 tsp methi dana bhigo kar subah pani piye, dane chaba sakte hain agar suit kare.

herbs.name: Cinnamon
herbs.how_to_use: Chhota tukda dalchini chai/garam pani me daal kar din me 1 baar le (doctor se pooch kar).

herbs.name: Coconut oil
herbs.how_to_use: Cooking me refined oil ki jagah thoda coconut oil use kar sakte hain (doctor se discuss karke).

herbs.name: Jeera water
herbs.how_to_use: Subah ya raat ko 1 tsp jeera ubal kar pani piye, digestion support ke liye.

herbs.name: Jeera + ajwain mix
herbs.how_to_use: Barabar matra me jeera, ajwain bhun kar powder bana le. ½ tsp khane ke baad pani ke sath le.

herbs.name: Buttermilk (chaas)
herbs.how_to_use: Lunch ke baad namkeen nahi, halka jeera + dhaniya wali chaas le sakte hain.

herbs.name: Warm oil massage
herbs.how_to_use: Sarson ya til ke tel ko halka garm karke kamar par soft massage kare, phir garam kapde se cover kare.

herbs.name: Haldi milk
herbs.how_to_use: Raat ko ½ tsp haldi garm doodh me mila kar le, agar dairy suit kare.

herbs.name: Flax seeds
herbs.how_to_use: Roz 1–2 tsp bhune flax seeds ko chaba kar ya powder bana ke le sakte hain.

herbs.name: Turmeric
herbs.how_to_use: Khane me haldi thodi badha sakte hain, ya raat ko haldi doodh (doctor se pooch kar).

herbs.name: Hot water bag
herbs.how_to_use: Lower abdomen par hot water bag 10–15 min rakh kar mild relief mil sakta hai.

herbs.name: Ajwain tea
herbs.how_to_use: ½ tsp ajwain ko pani me ubal kar halka garm chai jaisa piye (agar doctor mana na kare).

herbs.name: Brahmi
herbs.how_to_use: Brahmi based herbal chai ya supplement doctor ki advice se use kar sakte hain.

herbs.name: Chamomile tea
herbs.how_to_use: Shaam ya raat ko 1 cup chamomile tea le, mobile screen se break ke sath.

herbs.name: Ashwagandha
herbs.how_to_use: Ashwagandha powder/tablet sirf doctor ki guidance se, suitable dose me le.

herbs.name: Tulsi tea
herbs.how_to_use: Din me 1–2 baar tulsi wali herbal chai le sakte hain, caffeine kum rakhe.

herbs.name: Amla juice
herbs.how_to_use: Subah 20–30 ml amla juice pani me milakar, doctor se pooch kar use kare.

herbs.name: Lemon water
herbs.how_to_use: Din me 1–2 baar nimbu pani light form me, bina zyada namak/sugar.

herbs.name: Ginger tea
herbs.how_to_use: Adrak ka chhota tukda chai me daal kar garam chai piye, din me 1–2 baar.

herbs.name: Haldi milk
herbs.how_to_use: Raat ko haldi doodh le, throat soothing ke liye (agar dairy suit kare).

herbs.name: Tulsi leaves
herbs.how_to_use: 2–3 tulsi patte chaba sakte hain ya kadha me daal kar le sakte hain.

herbs.name: Ginger tea
herbs.how_to_use: Halka adrak wali chai ya ginger water sips me le sakte hain.

herbs.name: Peppermint oil
herbs.how_to_use: Diluted peppermint oil ko temple par halka massage kare, aankho se door rakhe.

herbs.name: Dark quiet rest
herbs.how_to_use: Dark, quiet room me lete hue deep breathing kare 10–15 min.

herbs.name: Ginger
herbs.how_to_use: Adrak ko pani me ubal kar halka sips le, ya doctor se pooch kar ginger supplement.

herbs.name: Tulsi + ginger kadha
herbs.how_to_use: Tulsi, adrak, kali mirch ko pani me ubal kar kadha bana kar halki sips le.

herbs.name: Giloy juice
herbs.how_to_use: Giloy juice doctor ki advice par, proper dose me use kare.

herbs.name: Salt water gargle
herbs.how_to_use: Gungune pani me pinch namak daal kar din me 2–3 baar gargle kare.

herbs.name: Honey + warm water
herbs.how_to_use: 1 tsp shahad gungune pani me mila kar dheere dhire piye.

herbs.name: Lemon + honey water
herbs.how_to_use: 1 glass gungune pani me nimbu + thoda shahad milakar meal ke beech time le.

herbs.name: Buttermilk
herbs.how_to_use: Lunch ke baad jeera, dhaniya, thoda kala namak wali chaas le.

herbs.name: ORS / salt-sugar water
herbs.how_to_use: ORS ya 1 glass pani me salt + sugar sips me piye, dehydration se bachne ke liye.

herbs.name: Curd & rice
herbs.how_to_use: Plain dahi + steamy rice thoda thoda karke le, masala avoid kare.

herbs.name: Lemon water
herbs.how_to_use: Thoda nimbu pani chhote sips me piye, ek sath bahut nahi.

herbs.name: Ginger
herbs.how_to_use: Adrak ka chhota tukda ya ginger tea nausea me help kar sakti hai.

herbs.name: Rose water (external)
herbs.how_to_use: Cotton pad me gulab jal laga kar closed eyes par 5–10 min rakhe.

herbs.name: Cold compress
herbs.how_to_use: Thanda paani me bheega kapda aankho par kuch min rakhe, screen se break le.

herbs.name: Cucumber slices
herbs.how_to_use: Kheere ke slice thande karke 10–15 min eyes par rakhe.

herbs.name: Potato juice
herbs.how_to_use: Kachche aloo ka juice cotton se dark area par 10 min lagaye, phir dhole.

herbs.name: Amla
herbs.how_to_use: Amla juice ya raw amla ko diet me daily add kare (doctor se pooch kar).

herbs.name: Haldi + black pepper
herbs.how_to_use: Haldi me thoda kali mirch add karke khane me use kare.

herbs.name: Lemon honey water
herbs.how_to_use: Subah gungune pani me nimbu + thoda shahad, heavy breakfast ke saath balanced diet me.

herbs.name: Green tea
herbs.how_to_use: Din me 1–2 cup green tea, bina sugar ke, chai/coffee ki jagah.

herbs.name: Banana shake
herbs.how_to_use: Banana + doodh ka shake doctor se pooch kar diet me add kare.

herbs.name: Dates
herbs.how_to_use: Din me 3–5 khajoor snack ke roop me le sakte hain.

herbs.name: Banana
herbs.how_to_use: Din me 1–2 baar soft ripe banana le sakte hain, agar doctor allow kare.

herbs.name: Coconut water
herbs.how_to_use: Din me 1 glass nariyal pani le, spicy/oily food avoid kare.

herbs.name: Saunf chew
herbs.how_to_use: Khana khane ke baad ½ tsp saunf chaba sakte hain.

herbs.name: Cold milk
herbs.how_to_use: Thanda doodh halki si matra me dhire dhire piye, agar suit kare.

herbs.name: Coconut oil
herbs.how_to_use: Snan ke baad halki si coconut oil skin par massage kare.

herbs.name: Aloe vera
herbs.how_to_use: Fresh aloe gel ko night me dry area par lagaye, morning dhole.

herbs.name: Multani mitti pack
herbs.how_to_use: 1 tbsp multani mitti + rose water se paste bana kar 8–10 min ke liye face par lagaye, phir dhole.

herbs.name: Rose water toner
herbs.how_to_use: Cotton pad se din me 2–3 baar face par rose water wipe kare.

herbs.name: Aloe vera gel
herbs.how_to_use: Raat ko thin layer aloevera gel laga kar so jaye, subah face wash kare.

herbs.name: Local honey
herbs.how_to_use: Daily chhoti matra me local shahad kha sakte hain (agar allergy nahi hai).

herbs.name: Steam inhalation
herbs.how_to_use: Garum paani ki bhaap 5–10 min le, aankhe closed rakhe.

herbs.name: Steam
herbs.how_to_use: Garam bhaap me thoda ajwain ya eucalyptus oil daal kar 5–7 min inhale kare.

herbs.name: Ginger tea
herbs.how_to_use: Din me 1–2 baar ginger wali chai le, cold drinks avoid kare.

herbs.name: Honey + ginger
herbs.how_to_use: Adrak ka rasa + shahad thodi matra me din me 2–3 baar le (doctor ki advice se).

herbs.name: Steam inhalation
herbs.how_to_use: Chest jam ke liye garam steam slowly inhale kare.

herbs.name: Dates
herbs.how_to_use: Din me 3–5 khajoor snack ke roop me, doctor ke guidance se sugar dhyan me rakh kar.

herbs.name: Coconut water
herbs.how_to_use: 1–2 baar nariyal pani le sakte hain hydration aur minerals ke liye.
